sentence: In trading on Friday, the iShares North American Tech-Software ETF ( IGV ) is outperforming other ETFs, up about 0.2% on the day.
Components of that ETF showing particular strength include shares of SALESFORCE.COM ( CRM ), up about 4.7% and shares of Mentor Graphics ( MENT ), up about 2.5% on the day.
And underperforming other ETFs today is the Oil Services ETF ( OIH ), off about 1.3% in Friday afternoon trading.
Among components of that ETF with the weakest showing on Friday were shares of Transocean ( RIG ), lower by about 1.9%, and shares of Superior Energy Services (SPN), lower by about 1.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
